messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hiiii creeeew your friendly moth mothball here

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I only have two rules just to keep station happy no being mean to lizards and do all the drugs you want

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Oh oh also pugs for all  and can someone please bring me some moth foods

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Oh oh if theres any meanie butts on station please dont be a meanie butt I will help with what I can if I can

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, not more than 15 squeaking things have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We have squeaky things in maint please pet them if you want to you can eat them

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fix coms also I got turned into a skeleton though you should be listening to your mothy captain when I say take pizzas to kitchen also everyone can bop leo for stealing pizza and not sharing just dont kill him

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Since leo wants to be a meanie butt and mutinus you can end him

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Mothy is like a mother will be nice with good kids punish the bad and leo is a bad bad boy

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: New rule clowns are meanie butts they work like pinatas beat the candy out of them if you see them

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Last rule is revoked if clown apologizes to captain however

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All lasers are banned

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Blame the clown for that though clown rule is now revoked but he still needs to aplogize

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Only sec and captain can use weapons but since clown is a pinata baseball bats can be used for them

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Garden.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Clown is no longer pinata leo is

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Clown is mutinus him and leo are your pinatas smash them till there brains and candy pops out

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fir-r-rs-st t-t-to k-kil-l-ll l-leo g-get-ts al-l-ll-l ac-cc-c-ces-ss-s

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Mothball. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HONK

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Science.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.
